body:
```
$ git clone https://github.com/LLNL/spack.git
$ cd spack
$ bin/spack install openspeedshop
==> Error: Invalid spec: 'libxml2@2.9.4%gcc@5.3.1~python arch=linux-fedora23-x86_64^xz@5.2.2%gcc@5.3.1 arch=linux-fedora23-x86_64^zlib@1.2.8%gcc@5.3.1 arch=linux-fedora23-x86_64'. Package libxml2 requires variant +python, but spec asked for ~python

```
title: Error building openspeedshop
